title: My RGB is better than yours - Govee AI Box
description: Thanks to Govee for sponsoring today's video. As the first product of its kind to utilize the AI technology, Govee AI brings you an out-of-monitor immersion experience! Learn more about the Govee CogniGlow AI algorithm down below:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    SUBSCRIBE ON FLOATPLANE:    GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Intro 0:23 What's in the Box 2:35 Lights in Action 4:11 Gaming Effects 5:42 Govee App 6:45 Outro
